title: Uptown Bounce
description: Two museums, one block party—el museo del barrio and the museum of the city of new york team up for the annual uptown bounce. Expect djs, dancing, free museum admission, and more, with unique programming at each spot.
address: el museo del barrio and the museum of the city of new york

title: Hudson Classical Theater Company: The Lady from the Sea
description: Hudson Classical Theater Company celebrates its 22nd summer season with intimate, outdoor productions of Henrik Ibsen's The Lady from the Sea at the Soldiers’ and Sailors’ Monument in Riverside Park. Pay-what-you-can admission (donations will be accepted following the show).
address: Soldiers’ and Sailors’ Monument, Riverside Park

title: Broadway in Bryant Park
description: Broadway comes to Bryant Park as stars perform some of their biggest hits at this annual lunchtime performance series. Today: Hadestown, Hamilton, Mamma Mia!, Moulin Rouge! The Musical, Six, and The Outsiders with a pre-show by the AMDA College of the Performing Arts.

title: Live at the Archway: Summer Music + Art in the Dumbo Archway
description: Sights and sounds fill the public plaza underneath the Manhattan Bridge in Dumbo. Tonight: Philly-based singer-songwriter Sug Daniels and Jenn Macksoud. Food and drink will be available for purchase. Rain or shine.

title: Sunset Salsa
description: Dance into golden hour at Hudson River Park’s Sunset Salsa series, returning to Pier 76 for the summer. Led by performer and instructor Talía Castro-Pozo, each night kicks off with a beginner salsa lesson—open to first-timers and seasoned dancers alike—followed by an open dance party with guest DJs.

title: Top Shelf Stories
description: Julia Whitehouse serves up an evening of carefully crafted storytelling at UCB (East Village). Tonight’s show features guests Pavar Snipe, Natasha Vaynblat, Sharon Spell, and Nat Townsen, plus one open mic slot reserved for an audience member.

title: F*Bomb Presents: Hole Tribute
description: Following up last month's Nirvana tribute concert, the F*Bomb rock + roll party gets grungy again with a tribute to Hole.

title: Divaland Presents: Disney Channel Pageant
description: Eight drag contestants go head-to-head in three nostalgia-fueled categories inspired by the Disney Channel shows you couldn’t get enough of. Judged by Wizards of Waverly Place alum Dan Benson and RuPaul’s Drag Race’s Robin Fierce.
